title: Adilette Shower Slides
subtitle: Yoga
description: From the pool deck to the shower to the couch, these slides are made for the work-hard-rest-hard lifestyle. The slip-on construction gives you a snug fit that's easy to kick on and off as needed. Lightweight cushioning keeps your feet cradled in all-day comfort. The adidas logo and 3-Stripes design complete the iconic Adilette style.
details: Regular fit; Slip-on construction; Synthetic upper; Textile lining; Contoured footbed; Cloudfoam midsole; Synthetic outsole; Imported; Product color: Legend Ink / Cloud White / Legend Ink; Product code: GZ5920
colors: Core Black / Wonder White / Core Black

title: Supernova 2 Running Shoes
subtitle: Men's Running
description:
Who says running needs to be uncomfortable? These shoes are designed to help you run comfortable every time, on any terrain. From a precisely balanced mix of Bounce and increased Boost in the midsole to a new padded tongue and heel patch construction, experience comfort with every step. 

Supernova 2 is now made with a lower carbon footprint of 10% compared to the 2020 Supernova. From raw material extraction, processing, packaging, all the way to the end of product's life, we calculate and communicate its carbon footprint, conforming to an internationally recognized standard: ISO 14067 

To reduce our footprint, we need to measure it. The concise footprint results made available to you, provide full transparency on the complete lifecycle of the product. This is just one of our initiatives to help reduce our footprint.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Boost and Bounce midsole; Reduced carbon footprint; Direct injected TPU outsole; Padded tongue and heel; Weight: 275g; Midsole drop: 9mm (heel: 25mm / toe: 16mm); Imported; Product color: Dash Grey / Shadow Navy / Solar Green; Product code: GW9093
colors: Grey Six / Silver Metallic / Beam Orange

title: ZX 22 BOOST Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description:
Rooted in innovation, these adidas shoes rethink the progressive adidas ZX series, bringing in a degree of simplicity to the line's storied legacy. Suede overlays, reflective accents and molded TPU hardware details stand out on the sleek ripstop upper. The JET BOOST midsole brings energized comfort and stability to your every move.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Lace closure; Ripstop upper with suede overlays; EVA midsole with JET BOOST drop-in; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Aluminium / Magic Beige / Silver Metallic; Product code: GX7008
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Semi Impact Orange

title: NMD_R1 Shoes
subtitle: Women's Originals
description: In a constantly changing world, be part of the change for good. Join our mission to help end plastic waste by slipping on these adidas NMD_R1 shoes. All the signature staples of the NMDs are still there — from the sock-like knit upper to the plush BOOST midsole and iconic heel plugs. You're not just doing good with these sneakers; you're feeling and looking good too.
details: Lace closure; Stretch knit upper; Hugs the foot; Textile lining; BOOST midsole; Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Night Brown / Night Brown / Feather Grey; Product code: GX1775

These adidas Superstar shoes embrace the "Make it juicy" mentality — it's literally right there on the tongue label. description:

*60% of 2021 World Major Marathon wins were by athletes wearing Adizero Adios Pro 2.

description:
The adidas NMD shoes aren't tied to any one era. They're based on '80s running designs, infused with technology from today and then turned up with style fit for the future. So when you step in, it's kind of like you're time traveling. Wherever you wear yours, you can count on feeling comfortable thanks to the plush and responsive BOOST midsole that gives back energy with every step you take.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

description:
Made for running, and so much more. Created in collaboration with South African luxury brand Thebe Magugu, these shoes sport a color mix that celebrates themes of culture, sisterhood and community. They're built for step-in comfort and responsiveness, with a BOOST midsole for stability and energy return. The adidas PRIMEKNIT upper gives a comfy, foot-hugging fit. Wear them for short runs, wear them all day.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

description:
Comfortable running shoes make all the difference. That's where these adidas shoes come in. Designed specifically for and by women, they combine flex zone areas under the forefoot and energy-returning Bounce cushioning for a springy step. Structured to adapt to the shape of the foot, they look stylish and keep you streamlined too. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

description:
Classic adidas shoes for kids' fast-moving feet. They're ready for the park or the playground, with elastic laces and a hook-and-loop strap for easy on and off. The synthetic leather upper can withstand plenty of stomping, swinging and puddle-jumping. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

description:
The expression is all you, but the adidas OZNOVA Shoes encourage it fully with an experimental fluid design. Different lines and textures flow throughout the sneakers, and are emphasized further by fresh volumes and proportions. Adiplus technology, a super-soft, polyurethane foam encapsulated in plush EVA, delivers pure, innovative, undeniable comfort.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Lace closure; Nubuck and suede upper; Adiprene cushioning; EVA midsole inserts; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Grey Six / Grey Four / Trace Grey; Product code: GW9398
